title: Stadia Changelog: Far Cry 6 is free for the weekend, Pro lineup for April revealed
content:
It was a quiet week for Stadia with just one new game released, but there’s some fun in the pipeline with April’s Stadia Pro lineup having been revealed and Far Cry 6 offering up a free-to-play weekend.

more…

The post Stadia Changelog: Far Cry 6 is free for the weekend, Pro lineup for April revealed appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: For a limited time, Ubisoft's Far Cry 6 is available to play for free on Google Stadia, just in time for the Stranger Things update.
